svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2020-05-22T04:16:38.035Z" agent="5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/81.0.4044.138 Safari/537.36" etag="FO_SFPDkNtgBCFX7YVvG" version="13.1.3" type="github"><diagram id="vP-kHJmLFm4Uj2iFX2sr" name="IntroMicroservices"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 478px; height: 1px; padding-top: 67px; margin-left: 202px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Sign into GCP
Enable Compute Engine API & Kubernetes Engine API
Open Google Cloud Shell
Create 2 sessions and run
gcloud compute zones list
gcloud config set compute/zone us-east-1-b
wget https://storage.googleapis.com/golang/go1.6.2.linux-amd64.tar.gz
sudo rm -rf /usr/local/go
sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf go1.6.2.linux-amd64.tar.gz
echo "export GOPATH=~/go" >> ~/.bashrc
source ~/.bashrc
mkdir -p $GOPATH/src/github.com/udacity
cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/udacity
git clone https://github.com/udacity/ud615
cd ud615/app
mkdir bin
cd monolith
go get -u
cd ..
go build -o ./bin/monolith .monolith
sudo ./bin/monolith -http :10080
...In a new terminal window:
curl http://127.0.0.1:10080
curl http://127.0.0.1:10080/secure
TOKEN=$(curl http://127.0.0.1:10080/login -u user | jq -r '.token')
echo $TOKEN
curl -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN" http://127.0.0.1:10080/secure

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 225px; margin-left: 11px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 385px; margin-left: 1px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 478px; height: 1px; padding-top: 667px; margin-left: 202px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
#...Breakdown Monolith into Microservices
#... Shell 1
go build -o ./bin/hello ./hello
sudo ./bin/hello -http 0.0.0.0:10082
#... Shell 2
go build -o ./bin/auth ./auth
sudo ./bin/auth -http :10090 -health :10091
#... Shell 3
TOKEN=$(curl 127.0.0.1:10090/login -u user | jq -r '.token')
curl -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN" http://127..0.0.1:10082/secure

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 258px; height: 1px; padding-top: 20px; margin-left: 201px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Most actions will be done from ~/go/src/github.com/udacity

switch.text: Most actions will be done from ~/go/src/git...

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
